entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
